title: Tiger Pasta
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 太革義廚 is a pasta restaurant that opened in Hualien summer 2015. The menu marks 4 or 5 vegan and a few more vegetarian choices, such as spaghetti with vegetables, mushroom, and basil sauce. In English vegan items are marked as "vegetarian" (全素), and vegetarian options are marked "ovo-lacto vegetarian" (素食). Order and pay for your meal at a machine near the entrance. There is self-service hot black coffee, hot and cold black tea, and cold water that is free.
